entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
